question.content: Who sits near him on the bus?
question.choice: A mother and her little son.
A mother and her little girl.

question.content: At last, Tom is angry because ___.
question.choice: He thinks that the mother makes the little boy cry.
The little boy takes his cap.

question.content: The mother can't make her son stop crying because ___.
question.choice: Because she can't ask Tom to give her his cap.
Because she likes to see her son crying.
Because she doesn't know how to make him laugh.
